snippet.title: Kidbash: Super Legend | Roguelite Action Platformer Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Kidbash: Super Legend is here with a new trailer!

Get ready to join Kidbash’ on a roguelike adventure through the O.D.D. Run, jump, dash, wall jump through the mountain (and into another universe!). Mix your weapons, train, defeat evil, help friends rebuild their village, pet cute animals along the way! 

Can you become the SUPER LEGENDARY hero? Win, lose, and learn as you embark on this nostalgic journey.

Check out our Steam page to learn more and wishlist it! steampowered.com/app/2681870

#indiedev #gamedev #indiegame #roguelike
